is a colorfully-named town on the coast of

, and is best known for its association with the Wright Brothers' historic flights in the first airplane in 1903. The flights are usually associated with Kitty Hawk, but actually took place here. A national monument and museum marks the site.
There is a large monument to the Wright Brothers on a giant sand dune near the beach.  It is, to say the least, difficult to miss.
You are at the beach.  Have fun!

value: content=The biggest barbecue joint on the beach. The food is generally good and reasonably priced. Stick to the basics, though, such as the five types of barbecue and the ribs and chicken. Though past its heyday, the new owners are working hard to bring the place back to its glory days of the 90s.
content=Three-story town homes feature two and three bedroom units surrounded by lush dunes and vegetation.
content=Hamilton Cay offers 2 and 3 Bedroom units that are on a single floor layout. Volleyball and watersliding are just a few of the many activities Hamilton Cay has to offer.

content=Vacation rentals (nightly, weekly, & group stay packages), luxury oceanfront condo rentals, includes pool, spa, fitness room, game room, elevator access.
content=Vacation rentals, 2-10 bedrooms, private pools, pet-friendly, event planning. Offers Resort Club collection of top-of-the-line vacation properties.
content=Vacation rentals. Bed linens & bath towels included; 1 - 17 bedrooms, private pools, hot tubs, game rooms, elevator, dog-friendly.
name=Village Realty on the Outer Banks of North Carolina

content= Over 600 upscale accommodations in Nags Head, Kill Devil Hills and Corolla. All bed linens and towels are provided, beds are made. Oceanfront, golf course, soundfront, oceanside. Many homes have Private Pools, (some heated) and Hot Tubs, Elevators, Theater Rooms. Pet friendly homes available.
content=Ramada hotels cater to a variety of clientele, from business travelers to family vacationers.
content=Sun Realty offers a wide collection of beach vacation rental homes and cottages in Kill Devil Hills and the entire stretch of the Outer Banks.
content=Oceanfront hotel.  Prime location.  Outdoor pool, free breakfast, WiFi.  Pet Friendly.
